word: "I DO NOT NOW EXPECT TO BE LIFTED ABOVE ALL INFIRMITIES AND TRIBULATIONS, AND TO HAVE AN UNRUFFLED SEA ON THE JOURNEY HEAVENWARD.  I EXPECT TRIALS, LOSSES, DISAPPOINTMENTS, AND BEREAVEMENTS"--AND SHE HAD THEM, TWO CHILDREN AND HER HUSBAND BURIED WHERE SHE WILL SOON BE BURIED BY THEIR SIDE, IN MICHIGAN; SHE HAD HER TRIALS IN THAT WAY, AND IN OTHER WAYS--"BUT I HAVE THE SAVIOUR'S PROMISE, 'MY GRACE IS SUFFICIENT FOR THEE.'
